verbs.description: John Oliver ’s Catheter Cowboy [V: will] be visible to Hannity watchers in Washington , D.C. this week in an effort to persuade Donald Trump to keep the Iran nuclear deal .

John Oliver ’s Catheter Cowboy will be visible to Hannity watchers in Washington , D.C. this week in an effort to [V: persuade] [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARG2: to keep the Iran nuclear deal] .
